```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
```

```{r}
eco_mutate <- economics %>% 
  mutate(years = year(date),
         months = month(date),
         decade = factor(round(years / 10) * 10)) %>% 
  gather(key = metric_name, value = measurement, pce, pop, psavert, uempmed, unemploy)

eco_mutate %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = date, y = measurement, color = decade)) +
  geom_line() +
  facet_grid(metric_name ~ ., scales = "free_y") +
  theme_classic() +
  theme(legend.position = "bottom")
```
